2019_2022.title: Bayt El Omor
2019_2022.plot: Tinged with melancholy, this tightly staged short film follows a nostalgic Lebanese widow grappling to honor her late husband, despite her life being at stake in the walls of her own home.

2019_2022.title: Barakat
2019_2022.plot: For the elderly man preparing for his grandson's wedding in Manon Nammour's affecting and elegant drama, the accelerating rate of change in Beirut threatens to create a city he no longer knows by heart.

2019_2022.title: Sett El Donia
2019_2022.plot: A love letter to Beirut, a city like no other.

2019_2022.title: Soukoon
2019_2022.plot: While her marital life decays, Mariam gets pregnant.

2019_2022.title: Clustifer
2019_2022.plot: When cluster headache illness takes over,all hell breaks loose and life becomes a living inferno, will Karim be able to overcome his Clustifer?
